_header: If I had space now for to write
Note:
Cf. Seaton (1961)
XSeaton, Ethel. Sir Richard Roos, c. 1410-1482: Lancastrian Poet. London: R. Hart-Davis, 1961, 324. Cf. also 2361.
_description: The lover’s pains — one 8-line tail-rhyme stanza

PROSP1246.First Lines: Yf I had space now for to writemy mortal paynes…
